author: PR.com
title: Business-Inform TV: Video Reports Regarding Office Printing Industry News
text:
Business-Inform TV: Video Reports Regarding Office Printing Industry News
Moscow, Russia, September 03, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Information Agency “Business-Inform” (Moscow) announces that within the framework of Business-Inform Informational Project, a new informational channel, Business-Inform TV, begins its work. It aims at the creation and distribution of video reports containing office printing industry news, as well as information regarding events (exhibitions, conferences, seminars) organized by the Agency within the framework of Business-Inform Project.
The partner company of Business-Inform TV is Live Production, which has a great deal of experience in the field of creating video-reports for various events and presentations.
Here are the first video stories made by Business-Inform TV: Business-Inform 2015 Expo
This report covers the International Office Equipment Supplies and Parts Exhibition (Moscow, Vdnkh, May 19-21, 2015). It demonstrates exhibitors interviews, fragments of professional meetings and discussions. Duration is 5min 20sec.
Sindoh on Business-Inform 2015 Expo
This report is about a Korean company and Sindoh printing equipment featured at the International Office Equipment Supplies and Parts Exhibition Business-Inform 2015 (Moscow, Vdnkh, May 19-21, 2015). Also featured are interviews with Volker Kappius, ceo of Delacamp AG (Germany), the exclusive distributor of Sindoh equipment in Europe, and Alexei Belikov, director of Sindoh (Russia), the distributor of Sindoh equipment in Russia, as well as fragments demonstrating the work of Sindoh mfp. Duration is 5min 17sec.
Video reports created by Business-Inform TV are presented on Business-Inform websites and on the websites of the Agency’s partners, as well as on Youtube.
